description:
## Stage 4: Model (source_id)

Registers a complete model configuration — the final step in the EMD workflow.

**Prerequisites:** Component config IDs from Stage 3; Model family ID (if applicable).

> [!NOTE]
> Please ensure you are familiar with the completion guidance in the collapsible dropdown where it exists. Failure to do so will result in a failed submission.
> To modify an existing entry, see __[modifying entries](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/tree/production?tab=contributing-ov-file#2-modifying-or-reusing-existing-entries)__.

label: Model Name
description: The full model name that becomes the CMIP source_id.

label: Model Family
description: The Earth System family that this model belongs to.

label: Description
description: A scientific overview of the model mentioning all component types and their treatment.
placeholder:
1. Dynamic components (briefly)
2. Prescribed components and their treatment
3. Omitted components

label: Dynamic Components
description: **Select multiple.** The components that are actively simulated in this model.

label: Prescribed Components
description: **Select multiple.** The components with prescribed boundary conditions in this model.

label: Omitted Components
description: **Select multiple.** The components that are not represented in this model.

label: Component Config IDs
description: The component configuration IDs from Stage 3 that make up this model.

label: Embedded Components
description: **Select multiple.** Pairs of embedded and host components where one runs within another (embedded -> host).

label: Coupling Groups
description: Groups of components that are mutually coupled and exchange data.

label: Calendar(s)
description: **Select multiple.** The permitted calendar types for this model.

label: Release Year
description: The year when this model was released.

label: Reference DOIs
description: The DOI URLs for model description papers.

---

## Issue Handling

**After submission:**
- Creates `model` entry with CMIP source_id
- Registration complete — model can be used in CMIP activities
- [Track progress in issue comments](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/Essential-Model-Documentation/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20author%3A%40me)

label: Issue Kind
description: Whether this is a new submission or a modification to an existing entry.
